name: Hungry Chicken (johnCavatelli)
description:
This is the first game I've created, so its obviously quite amateur.  That being said, it runs and I hope the 2 people that see it enjoy the game!

-Arrow keys to move chicken (camera moves automatically)

-Hold space to start eating (must be for 1sec to complete)

-Have the chicken (not his beak) ON the blue food platforms before you eat

-Goal is to see how large you can get
